SA14bsa033_u:653: māhāyānikabhāvanāmārgīyāryapudgalasantatisthā mahākaruṇā asyāḥ kṛpayā na śame sthitiritimārgajñatāyā upalakṣikā /
SA14bsa033_u:655: māhāyānikasyāryasya sattvālambanā dharmālambanā nirālambanā ceti tisro mahākaruṇāḥ,
SA14bsa033_u:657: traiyadhvikadharmāṇāmanutpādākāreṇa tulyatāvabodhāt yā śrāvakādyagocaratvena viprakṛṣṭā bodhisattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitā,
SA14bsa033_u:665: asya lakṣaṇādikaṃ sarvam abhisamayālaṅkāre kārikārdhena spaṣṭamullikhitam tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:668: śrāvakādīnām adhvasamatājñānābhāvāt anityādyākārāṇāṃ sākṣātkāri jñānaṃ sanimittopalambhayogena kṛpāprajñāvaikalyāt dūrībhūtaṃ jinajananyā iti lakṣaṇam /
SA14bsa033_u:674: asya lakṣaṇādīnāṃ pratipādanam abhisamayālaṅkāre kārikārdhena samyak kṛtam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:677: mahākaruṇayā śūnyatāsākṣātkāriṇyā prajñayā copāttaṃ māhāyānikaryāṇāṃ hīnayānajātīyam anityādyākārajñānam asya lakṣaṇam /
SA14bsa033_u:678: “bodhisattvādīnāṃ tu utsāritabhāvābhiniveśabhrāntinimittānāṃ rūpādisarvadharmaparijñānameva tatsamatāparijñānamityataḥ samyagāsannībhāvo māturiti jñeyam /“
SA14bsa033_u:686: asya lakṣaṇādikam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayāṃ kārikayā suspaṣṭaṃ pratipāditam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:690: mahākaruṇā śūnyatāprajñābhyāṃ viyuktā bhāvolambhasvabhāvā hainayānikī vastujñateti lakṣaṇam /
SA14bsa033_u:691: “sarveṣāṃ rūpādīnāṃ traiyadhvikānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ sāsravānāsravobhayasthānīyānāmanupalambhasvarūpāṇāṃ sarvatra bhāvopalambhatayā te paraparikalpitātmādiśūnyatvena dṛṣṭāḥ /
SA14bsa033_u:692: anuṣṭhānasaṃjñā tu eteṣāṃ pratipakṣabhūtāpi viparyāsapravṛttatvena heyatvāt vipakṣo bhavati /“
SA14bsa033_u:694: asya bhedo 'vadhiścetyubhau 'anupāyena dūratvam ' ityasmin prakareṇa yathā pradarśitau,
SA14bsa033_u:697: asya lakṣaṇabhedādikaṃ sarvam abhisamayālaṅkāre tisṛbhiḥ kārikābhiḥ savistaramupadarśitam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:705: mahākaruṇopāyena śūnyatāsākṣātkāriṇyā prajñayā copāttā māhāyānikāryasantatisthā vastujñatā pratipakṣalakṣaṇātmikā /
SA14bsa033_u:707: ubhāvapi pūrva 'upāyena avidūratā ' ityasmin prasaṅge yathāvarṇitau tathā jñātavyau /
SA14bsa033_u:722: evaṃ kṛtvā yathoktau vai jñeyaḥ sarvajñatānaye /
SA14bsa033_u:725: “śrāvakādīnāmevaṃ māturdūrībhāvenānuṣṭhānaṃ pratipakṣo 'pi san vastūpalambhaviparyāsapravṛttatvena bodhisattvānāṃ tyājyatvād vipakṣa iti” /
SA14bsa033_u:727: asya lakṣaṇabhedādikaṃ sarvam abhisamayālaṅkāre sārdhadvayena kārikāgranthena savistaraṃ pratipāditam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:730: avikāro na kartā ca prayogo duṣkarastridhā /
SA14bsa033_u:734: sāṃvṛtike vastusvarūpe tadviśeṣe ca viparyāsapravṛttasya upalambhābhiniveśasya pratipakṣabhūto hīnayānajātīyaḥ sattvayogaḥ prayoga iti lakṣaṇam /
SA14bsa033_u:750: asyāḥ svarūpam abhisamayālaṅkāre kārikārdhena samādarśitam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:755: pūrvokteṣu daśavidhaprayogeṣu pratisvaṃ catasraḥ amananā bhavantīti catvāriṃśadasyāḥ samatāyāḥ prabhedā bhavanti /
SA14bsa033_u:761: asya lakṣaṇādikaṃ sarvam abhisamayālaṅkāre pañcabhiḥ kārikābhiḥ pratipāditam /
SA14bsa033_u:765: trayāṇāṃ yānānāṃ trayāṇāṃ darśamārgāṇāṃ vyāvṛttibhedena ṣoḍaśa kṣaṇā evāsya ṣoḍaśa bhedā bhavantīti /
SA14bsa033_u:783: 11. upāyakauśalamityekādaśa dharmāḥ sarvākārābhisambodhamupalakṣayantīti abhisamayālaṅkāre dvābhyāṃ kārikābhyāmupadarśitam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:789: trisarvajñatāsambaddhānāṃ trisaptatyuttaraikaśatākārāṇāṃ bhāvanāmayyā prajñayopāttatvena vyavasthāpitaḥ satvayogaḥ sarvākārābhisambodha iti lakṣaṇam /
SA14bsa033_u:803: ākārāṇāṃ lakṣaṇādikaṃ sarvam abhisamayālaṅkāre pañcabhiḥ kārikābhiḥ savistaraṃ samyagupavarṇitam /
SA14bsa033_u:805: sarvākāramārgavastujñānasaṃgraheṇa trisarvajñatākārāṇāṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ prayogavaiśiṣṭyam ākārāṇāṃ lakṣaṇamiti /
SA14bsa033_u:811: caturāryasatyeṣu prathamataḥ trayāṇāṃ satyānāṃ pratyekaṃ catvāra iti dvādaśa,
SA14bsa033_u:816: catvāraḥ pratisatyaṃ te mārge pañcadaśa smṛtāḥ //
SA14bsa033_u:820: nirodhasatyasya ṣoḍaśa ceti mārgajñatāyāḥ ṣaṭtriṃśad ākārā bhavanti /
SA14bsa033_u:822: hetau mārge ca duḥkhe ca nirodhe ca yathākramam /
SA14bsa033_u:823: aṣṭau te sapta pañceti ṣoḍaśeti ca kīrtitāḥ //
SA14bsa033_u:826: buddhānāṃ sarvākārajñatāyā asādhāraṇā ekonacatvāriṃśacceti sarvākārajñatāyā daśottaraśatam ākārā bhavanti /
SA14bsa033_u:832: jñānākārebhyaḥ pūrvam arthākārāḥ parijñātavyā iti prathamataḥ trisaptatyuttaraśatam arthākārā upadarśitāḥ /
SA14bsa033_u:834: prayogāṇāṃ lakṣaṇādikam abhisamayālaṅkāre catasṛbhiḥ kārikābhiḥ savistaraṃ suspaṣṭamupavarṇitam /
SA14bsa033_u:836: jñātṛjñeyayoḥ vastumārgākārāṇāṃ ca śamathavipaśyanāyuganaddhabhāvanāsvarūpaṃ niḥsvabhāvatāniṣprapañcātmakaṃ jñānamevātra sākṣānnirdiṣṭasya prayogasya lakṣaṇamiti /
SA14bsa033_u:837: athavā - trisarvajñatānāṃ yāvadākārāṇāṃ śamathavipaśyanāyuganaddhabhāvanāmayyā prajñayopāttaḥ sattvayoga evātra nirdiṣṭaprayogasya lakṣaṇam /
SA14bsa033_u:838: yato hi 'kṛcchrāccireṇa prativodhataḥ ' ityanena nirdiṣṭaḥ sambhāramārgīyaḥ prayogo 'tra saṃgṛhīto bhavati /
SA14bsa033_u:850: na ca svapne 'pi ṣaṭpāramitācaryāsu dūrībhāva iti vyākaraṇalābhaprayogaḥ,
SA14bsa033_u:858: tadyathā paramārthato guṇadoṣāṇāṃ vṛddhiparihāṇyadarśanena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṇānujñānāt avṛddhyaparihāṇiprayogaḥ,
SA14bsa033_u:867: tasmāt paramaratnasvabhāvāyā mātuḥ saṃvatsareṇa bahvantarāyatve 'pi likhanaṃ śīghrameveti avadhiprayogaḥ /
SA14bsa033_u:869: guṇānāṃ lakṣaṇādikaṃ sarvam abhisamayālaṅkāre kārikārdhenopadarśitam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:875: tathā hi - pāramitāyāṃ udgṛhyamāṇāyāṃ mārakṛtavighnāḥ tathāgatānubhāvena vyāhanyanta iti māraśaktivyāghātaguṇaḥ,
SA14bsa033_u:890: prayogāṇāṃ doṣā abhisamayālaṅkāre kārikārdhena upadarśitāḥ / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:918: amī viśatiḥ doṣāḥ pāramitāyāṃ pravṛttasya yogino 'ntarāyakarāḥ pratipāditāḥ /
SA14bsa033_u:951: lakṣaṇasya pratipādanam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā kṛtam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:952: lakṣyate yena tajjñeyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ trividhaṃ ca tat /
SA14bsa033_u:953: jñānaṃ viśeṣaḥ kāritraṃ svabhāvo yaśca lakṣyate //
SA14bsa033_u:954: vistareṇa tu lakṣaṇānāṃ pratipādanam abhisamayālaṅkāre aṣṭādaśabhiḥ kārikabhiḥ samyag vihitam /
SA14bsa033_u:962: kāritralakṣaṇāni ekādaśa svabhāvalakṣaṇāni ṣoḍaśa ceti lakṣaṇānāṃ bhedā vistareṇa ekanavatiḥ bhavanti /
SA14bsa033_u:964: jñanalakṣaṇānāṃ sarveṣāṃ vistareṇa pratipādanam abhisamayālaṅkāre navabhiḥ kārikābhiḥ suspaṣṭaṃ vihitam /
SA14bsa033_u:967: kleśaliṅgādayo vakṣyamāṇāḥ svabhāvā eva eteṣāṃ upalakṣakāḥ /
SA14bsa033_u:972: sarvākārajñatāsaṃgṛhītāni jñānalakṣaṇāni ṣoḍaśa ceti tridhā bhedaḥ /
SA14bsa033_u:1044: viśeṣalakṣaṇānāṃ ṣoḍaśānāṃ lakṣaṇādikaṃ sarvam abhisamayālaṅkāre samyagupadarśitam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1052: māhāyānīyadarśanamārgīyakṣāntijñānakṣaṇāni ṣoḍhaśa śrāvakapratyekabuddhadarśanamārgasambaddhakṣāntijñānakṣaṇebhyo viśiṣṭatarāṇīti ṣoḍaśa bhedā bhavanti / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1053: duḥkhasatyālambanāni catuḥkṣaṇasaṃgṛhītāni kṣāntijñānāni kramaśaḥ acintyaviśeṣaḥ atulyaviśeṣaḥ,
SA14bsa033_u:1068: yena śrāvakādimārgebhyo bodhisattvādīnāṃ mārgajñatādidvaye viśeṣamārgo viśiṣyate /
SA14bsa033_u:1077: kāritrāṇāṃ lakṣaṇādikaṃ abhisamayālaṅkāre dvābhyāṃ kārikābhyāṃ samyagāveditam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1078: hitaṃ sukhaṃ ca trāṇaṃ ca śaraṇaṃ layanaṃ nṛṇām /
SA14bsa033_u:1083: hitasukhatrāṇādiprativiśiṣṭajñānaiḥ sattvaprayogāḥ parārthasampādanasādhanaiḥ yojyanta iti tāni kāritralakṣaṇānyucyante /
SA14bsa033_u:1104: kāritrākārairevaṃ yathāvat sarvajñatātrayasya prayogā lakṣyanta iti kāritralakṣaṇam /
SA14bsa033_u:1106: eteṣāṃ svabhāvalakṣaṇānāṃ svarūpapratipādanam abhisamayālaṅkāre tisṛbhiḥ kārikābhiḥ samyag vihitam /
SA14bsa033_u:1133: ityevaṃ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ svabhāvairyathāvat trisarvajñatāprayogā lakṣyanta iti svabhāvalakṣaṇāni /
SA14bsa033_u:1140: lakṣīva lakṣyate ceti caturthaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ matam //
SA14bsa033_u:1141: ityevaṃ sāmānyena ekatra kṛtāni ekanavatiḥ lakṣaṇāni bhavanti /
SA14bsa033_u:1143: asya sarvaṃ lakṣaṇādikam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā pratipāditam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1147: animittālambanajñānākāreṇa dānādyārabhya sarvākārajñatāparyantaṃ svasantāne samudāgame kauśalalakṣaṇo dharmābhisamaya evātra mokṣabhāgīyamiti lakṣaṇam /
SA14bsa033_u:1159: svarūpataḥ śrutamayaṃ cintāmayaṃ bhāvanāmayamiti trividhaṃ mokṣabhāgīyamiṣṭam /
SA14bsa033_u:1164: saṃsārādīnavān mokṣaguṇāṃśa śrāvaṃ śrāvaṃ romaharṣodgamāśrupātādayo bhavanti,
SA14bsa033_u:1167: asya lakṣaṇādikaṃ sarvam abhisamayālaṅkāre savistaraṃ pratipāditam /
SA14bsa033_u:1179: eṣu caturṣu pratyekaṃ mṛdumadhyādhimātrabhedena trividha iti dvādaśa bhedā bhavati /
SA14bsa033_u:1190: avaivartikabodhisattvasaṃghasya svarūpaṃ ekayā kārikayā abhisamayālaṅkāre proktam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1198: paraśca prābandhikabhāvanāmārgastha iti trividho bhavati avaivartikabodhisattvasaṃgha iti trayo 'sya bhedā bhavanti /
SA14bsa033_u:1202: asya samatāprayogasya lakṣaṇādim abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā pratipāditam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1206: pṛṣṭhalabdhāvasthāyāmapi sattāgrāhakavikalpaparikṣayāt śauddhabhūmikaṃ jñānaṃ bhavaśamasamatāprayogasya lakṣaṇam /
SA14bsa033_u:1208: tisṛṇāṃ śuddhabhūmīnāṃ trīṇi jñānānyevāsya trayo bhedāḥ /
SA14bsa033_u:1212: prayogastāsya lakṣaṇādikaṃ sarvam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā 'bhihitam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1216: praṇidhānādikuśalamūlabalena svabuddhakṣetraṃ sattvabhājanalokātmakaṃ pariśodhitukāmasya śauddhabhūmikāni jñānānyeva kṣetraśuddhiprayogasya lakṣaṇāni /
SA14bsa033_u:1222: asyopāyakauśalaprayogasya svarūpādikam abhisamayālaṅkāre dvābhyāṃ kārikābhyāmupadarśitam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1254: , ityaṣṭau dharmā mūrdhābhisamayamupalakṣayantīti abhisamayālaṅkāre pratipāditam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1257: pratyekaṃ darśanākhye ca bhāvanākhye ca vartmani /
SA14bsa033_u:1261: asyoṣmaṇo mūrdhaprayogasya svarūpam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayopadarśitam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1265: svapne 'pi sarvadharmāṇāṃ svapnābhatvadarśanādiṣu dvādaśaliṅgeṣu anyatamasya prāptyā vyavasthāpitaḥ prathamo nirvedhabhāgīya ūṣmā mūrdhaprayoga iti lakṣaṇam /
SA14bsa033_u:1268: nairātmyālambanāyā vidarśanāyāḥ prāptimārabhya bhūmiprāptiparyantamasya sīmā bhavati /
SA14bsa033_u:1270: asya mūrdhākhyasya mūrdhaprayogasya lakṣaṇādikam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā paridīpitam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1274: puṇyavivṛddhyādiṣoḍaśavivṛddhīnāṃ pūrṇatayā māhāyāniko dvitīyo nirvedhabhāgīyo mūrdhā mūrdhaprayoga iti lakṣaṇam /
SA14bsa033_u:1275: ayaṃ mūrdhā mūrdhaprayogaḥ mahāyānaprayogamārgīyo mūrdhaprayogaśceti samānārthakau /
SA14bsa033_u:1281: asya nirūḍhyākhyamūrdhaprayogasya sarvaṃ lakṣaṇādikam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayopavarṇitam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1286: anuttarā paripūriḥ nirūḍhyākhyastṛtīyo nirvedhabhāgīyaḥ kṣāntimūrdhaprayoga iti lakṣaṇam /
SA14bsa033_u:1287: ayaṃ kṣāntyākhyo mūrdhaprayogaḥ māhāyānikaḥ prayogamārgīyakṣāntiprayogaśceti dvau samānārthakau /
SA14bsa033_u:1291: yathā māhāyānikāyāḥ prayogamārgīyāyāḥ kṣānteravadhistathā asyāpi prayogasyāvadhirjñātavyaḥ /
SA14bsa033_u:1293: asya agradharmākhyasya mūrdhaprayogasya lakṣaṇādikam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā pratipāditam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1305: asya darśanamārgākhyasya mūrdhaprayogasya lakṣaṇādikam abhisamayālaṅkāre savistaraṃ aṣṭādaśabhiḥ kārikābhiḥ pratipāditam /
SA14bsa033_u:1307: darśanaheyāyāḥ sattāgrāhikāyā dṛṣṭeḥ pratipakṣabhāvena vyavasthāpito māhāyānikaḥ satyābhisamayo darśanamārgākhyo mūrdhaprayoga iti lakṣaṇam /
SA14bsa033_u:1308: ayaṃ darśanamārgākhyo mūrdhaprayogaḥ māhāyāniko darśanamārgaśca paryāyau /
SA14bsa033_u:1310: heyadṛṣṭyā darśanaprahātavyānāṃ caturṇāṃ vikalpānāṃ catvāraḥ pratipakṣā iti catvāro 'sya prabhedā bhavanti /
SA14bsa033_u:1315: asya bhāvanāmārgākhyasya mūrdhaprayogasya sarvaṃ lakṣaṇādikam abhisamayālaṅkāre navabhiḥ kārikābhiḥ savistaramabhihitam /
SA14bsa033_u:1317_1: dṛṣṭyā vyavasthāpito māhāyāniko 'nvabhisamayaḥ bhāvanāmārgākhyo mūrdhaprayoga iti lakṣaṇam /
SA14bsa033_u:1319: bhāvanāheyānāṃ navānāṃ vikalpānāṃ sākṣāt pratipakṣabhūtā navānantaryamārgāḥ,
SA14bsa033_u:1320: nava ca vimuktimārgā iti aṣṭādaśa asya bhāvanāmārgākhyasya mūrdhaprayogasya bhedā bhavanti /
SA14bsa033_u:1322: prathamāṃ bhūmimārabhya daśamīṃ bhūmiṃ yāvadasya sīmā bhavatīti /
SA14bsa033_u:1326: asya lakṣaṇādikaṃ sarvaṃ svarūpam abhisamayālaṅkāre tisṛbhiḥ kārikābhiḥ samyak pratipāditam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1334_1: avyavahitatvena sākṣādutpādakaḥ paryantayogaḥ ānantaryasamādhyākhyo mūrdhaprayoga iti lakṣaṇam /
SA14bsa033_u:1338: ekakṣaṇikāścatvāraḥ prayoga evāsya catvāro bhedā bhavanti /
SA14bsa033_u:1342_1: 'tra nirākarttavyā bhavantīti tāsāṃ vipratipattīnāṃ sarvaṃ lakṣaṇādikaṃ svarūpam
SA14bsa033_u:1342_2: abhisamayālaṅkāre tisṛbhiḥ kārikābhiḥ savistaraṃ samyak pratipāditam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1345: prayoge triṣu ratneṣu sopāye samaye muneḥ /
SA14bsa033_u:1350: saṃvṛtiparamārthasatyayordvayoḥ svabhāvata ekatvalakṣaṇayoḥ agrahaṇarūpāḥ sammukhībhūtavikalpāḥ tadbījāni vā nirākarttavyā vipratipattaya iti lakṣaṇam /
SA14bsa033_u:1353: tathā hi - saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtadhātvorabhāvatvena ālambanopapattauḥ sarvathā nīrūpatvād ālambanasvabhāvadhāraṇe,
SA14bsa033_u:1366: svasāmānyalakṣaṇānupapattyā bhāvanāyāṃ ceti sarvākārajñatādhiṣṭhānāḥ saṃśayarūpāḥ ṣoḍaśa vipratipattayo bhavanti /
SA14bsa033_u:1367: tāḥ yathāsambhavamubhayasatyāśritopāyakauśalena nirākṛtya samyak sarvathā niścayamutpādya kalyāṇakāmaiḥ bodhisattvairānantaryasamādhiradhigantavyaḥ /
SA14bsa033_u:1370: etāḥ ṣoḍaśāpi vipratipattayo kalpanātmikā śabdātmikā ceti dvayorantarbhavanti /
SA14bsa033_u:1371: dvayoḥ satyayorekamālambya yadaparaṃ nirākaroti tad abhiniveśātmakaṃ jñānameva kalpanātmikā vipratipattiḥ /
SA14bsa033_u:1372: dvayoḥ satyayorekaṃ nimittīkṛtya yā aparaṃ nirākaroti sā vāk śabdātmikā vipratipattiaravaseyā /
SA14bsa033_u:1378: ānupūrvikābhisamayasya svarūpanirdeśaḥ abhisamayālaṅkāre saṃkṣepataḥ kārikāśena kṛtaḥ / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1380: vistaratastu tasya lakṣaṇādikamanayā ekayā kārikayopanyastam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1381: dānena prajñayā yāvad buddhādau smṛtibhiśca sā /
SA14bsa033_u:1384: sarvākārajñatāditrisarvajñatākārān adhigatān anupūrvīkṛtya prajñābhāvanayopāttaḥ sattvayogaḥ ānupūrvikaprayoga iti lakṣaṇam /
SA14bsa033_u:1389: yo 'dhigamaḥ sa ānupūrvikābhisamayastrayodaśavidha ityasya trayodaśa bhedā bhavanti /
SA14bsa033_u:1395: ekakṣaṇābhisambodhasya svarūpanirdeśaḥ abhisamayālaṅkāre kārikārdhena saṃkṣepataḥ kṛtaḥ / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1399: adhigatatrisarvajñatākāreṣu svabhyastasteṣāmeva kṣaṇenaikenādhigamarūpaḥ paryantayogaḥ ekakṣaṇābhisambodha iti lakṣaṇam /
SA14bsa033_u:1410: asya sarvaṃ svarūpam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā parīdīpitam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1416: asya sarvaṃ svarūpam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā samyagabhihitam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1420: yadā bodhisattvasya pratipakṣabhāvanayā sarvavipakṣakalaṅkāpagamena sakalavyavadānapakṣavipākadharmatāvasthā śuklasvabhāvā jātā,
SA14bsa033_u:1421: tadā ekasminneva kṣaṇe vipākāvasthāprāptānām anāsravadharmāṇāṃ bodhāt jñānaṃ (prajñāpāramitā)
SA14bsa033_u:1426: asya svarūpādikaṃ sarvam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā suspaṣṭamupavarṇitam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1430_2: alakṣaṇāḥ sarvadharmā iti saṃkleśavyavadānarūpāṇāṃ sarvadharmāṇāmekenaiva kṣaṇena
SA14bsa033_u:1433: asyādvayalakṣaṇasya svarūpam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā spaṣṭamupadarśitam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1437: nirantaradīrghakāladvayapratibhāsaprahāṇābhyāsasātmībhāvād unmīlitadvayapratibhāsavāsano yadā bodhisattvo grāhyagrāhakayogena svapnaṃ grāhyaṃ svapnadarśinaṃ grāhakaṃ nekṣate,
SA14bsa033_u:1438: tadā sarve 'pyevaṃdharmāṇo dharmā iti dharmāṇāmadvayaṃ tattvamekenaiva kṣaṇena paśyati,
SA14bsa033_u:1445: aya ityadhigama ityevaṃ antimakāle dānādisarvānāsravadharmāṇāmaviparītaḥ samyak prativedhaḥ ekakṣaṇābhisambodha ityucyate /
SA14bsa033_u:1451: vipākabhūtasya dharmakāyasya saṃkṣiptanirdeśaḥ abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā paridīpitaḥ / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1457: sambhāradvayasaṃcayabalena prāptāḥ paryantaguṇā eva phalabhūto dharmakāya iti lakṣaṇam /
SA14bsa033_u:1465: asya svābhāvikakāyasyopapādanam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā kṛtam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1466: sarvākārāṃ viśuddhiṃ ye dharmāḥ prāptā nirāsravāḥ /
SA14bsa033_u:1475: asya jñānakāyasya svarūpam abhisamayālaṅkāre pañcabhiḥ kārikābhirupadarśitam /
SA14bsa033_u:1477: yāvajjñānaṃ yathāvajjñānaṃ cāpekṣya sākṣātkāri paryantajñāna jñānadharmakāya iti lakṣaṇam /
SA14bsa033_u:1480: buddhabhūmau anāsravajñānānāmekaviṃśatiḥ jñānavargā evāsya ekaviṃśatiḥ prabhedāḥ / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1516: sambhogakāyasya svarūpavarṇanam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā kṛtam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1520: sthānakāyaparivāradharmakālākhyaiḥ pañcabhirviniyatairvirśiṣṭaḥ kāyaḥ sambhogakāya iti lakṣaṇam /
SA14bsa033_u:1526: ayaṃ sambhogakāyo buddhabhūmau akaniṣṭhaghanavyūhakṣetre eva kevalaṃ bhavati /
SA14bsa033_u:1528: kāyasyāsya nairmāṇikasya svarūpam abhisamayālaṅkāre kārikayā ekayā samyagupavarṇitam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1529: karoti yena citrāṇi hitāni jagataḥ samam /
SA14bsa033_u:1530: ā bhavāt so 'nupacchinnaḥ kāyo nairmāṇiko muneḥ //
SA14bsa033_u:1533: yena śākyamunitathāgatādirūpeṇa āsaṃsāraṃ sarvalokadhātuṣu sattvānāṃ samīhitamarthaṃ samaṃ karoti,
SA14bsa033_u:1534: asau kāyaḥ prabandhatayā anuparato nairmāṇiko buddhasya bhagavataḥ sarvabālajanasādhāraṇaścaturtho 'vasātavyaḥ /
SA14bsa033_u:1541: imāni bhagavato vicitrāṇi kāritrāṇi abhisamayālaṅkāre saptabhiḥ kārikābhirvistaraśo nirdiṣṭāni /
SA14bsa033_u:1545: gatipraśamanakāritrata ārabhya nirvāṇaniveśanaparyantaṃ saptaviṃśatiḥ karmāṇyevāsya saptaviṃśatiḥ prabhedā bhavanti /
SA14bsa033_u:1548: gatīnāṃ śamanaṃ karmaṃ saṃgrahe ca caturvidhe //
SA14bsa033_u:1569: vineyajanapratibhāsabhāk saptaviṃśatiprakāraṃ karma avicchinnatayā āsaṃsāraṃ pravartate /
SA14bsa033_u:1574_0: aṣṭapadārthopalakṣakāṇāṃ ca saptateḥ padārthānāṃ prakāśakamidaṃ subhāṣitaṃ jagadguroḥ
SA14bsa033_u:1574_1: maitreyanāthasya mukhānniḥ-sṛtasyāgamasya caturdikṣuḥ prasārāya lokasya ca sanmārgārohaṇāya
SA14bsa033_u:1578: sarve 'mī jananīnibandhanakṛtād bījānmayāptācchubhāt sarvākāravarā bhavantu niyataṃ kāyatrayaprāpiṇaḥ //
